verses.name: Luke 24:33
verses.text: And they rose up the same hour, and returned to Jerusalem, and found the eleven gathered together, and them that were with them,

verses.name: Luke 24:34
verses.text: Saying, The Lord is risen indeed, and hath appeared to Simon.

verses.name: Luke 24:35
verses.text: And they told what things were done in the way, and how he was known of them in breaking of bread.

verses.name: Luke 24:36
verses.text: And as they thus spake, Jesus himself stood in the midst of them, and saith unto them, Peace be unto you.

verses.name: Luke 24:37
verses.text: But they were terrified and affrighted, and supposed that they had seen a spirit.
